and.name: MLToolkit
and.description: Simple java-absed machine learning toolbox with basic features for predictive data analysis

feature.name: Graphical
feature.description: Graphical user interface for interacting with various algorithms

feature.name: Console
feature.description: Command line interface for executing algorithms directly

feature.name: Debug
feature.description: Debugging state allows execution of unoptimized algorithms for extended information and logging

feature.name: ErrorLogging
feature.description: Extended logging information when facing errors

or.name: Tasks
or.description: Collection of tasks that this toolbox should be able to solve

feature.name: NeuralNetworks
feature.description: Implementation of Neural Network/Multi-layer perceptrons for classification

feature.name: SVM
feature.description: Simple and basic support vector machine classficator

feature.name: KMeans
feature.description: Basic k-means clustering algorithm with an slow heuristic approach to the selection of k

feature.name: RANSAC
feature.description: Randomized meta algorithm that is useful for fitting a model to a data set that has a large amount of outliers

feature.name: ScatterPlotMatrix
feature.description: Visualizes a matrix of scatter plots of the underlying data

feature.name: Histogram
feature.description: Visualizes histograms of the underlying multi-variant data

or.name: DataSetImport
or.description: Various file formats to import multi-variant data

feature.name: arff
feature.description: Attribute-Relation File Format used with the Weka machine learninjg software and developed by Department of Computer Science of The University of Waikato

and.name: Evaluation
and.description: Evaluation methods for measuring the quality of performed classification, clustering or regression

feature.name: KappaStatistics
feature.description: Evaluates a classifier based on the Kappa statistic

feature.name: F1Score
feature.description: Evaluates a classifier based on the harmonic mean of precision and recall rates. Only for binary classification problems

feature.name: MeanAbsError
feature.description: Uses the Mean of Absolute Errors between the predictions and the true values

feature.name: MeanSqrError
feature.description: Uses the Mean of the Squared Errors between the predictions and the true values

feature.name: DaviesBouldinIndex
feature.description: A measure for evaluating the quality of a clustering by measuring the distances of points to their centroids
